{{C|egx-dem|Mesopotamian deities}}

etymologies.etymology_text:
===Etymology 1===
From Late Period {{inh|egx-dem|egy|Íú•|a:Z1-pr|tr={{m|egy|Íú•}}|house}}, from earlier {{inh|egx-dem|egy|Íú•t|a:t*pr|tr={{m|egy|Íú•t}}|room}} (or else a formation from the same root).

definitions: [astrology] house, one of the twelve equal divisions of the ecliptic through which celestial bodies pass
both arms or hands, the arms collectively

etymologies.etymology_text:
==Demotic==

===Etymology===
A metathesized borrowing from the {{der|egx-dem|arc-imp|-}} gentilic plural {{m|arc-imp|ê°âê°Öê°çê°âê°ç|tr=ywnyn|ts=*yawnƒÅyƒ´n|t=Greeks}}, ultimately derived from {{der|egx-dem|grc|·ººœâŒΩ|·º∏·æ±ÃÅœùœâŒΩ|Ionian}}. Compare {{cog|arc-jla|◊ô÷∑◊ï÷∞◊†÷∏◊ê÷µ◊ô|◊ô÷∑◊ï÷∞◊†÷∏◊ê÷¥◊ô◊ü|tr=yawnƒÅ æƒ´n|t=Greeks}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|egx-dem|*/wa(j).jaÀàniÀên/}}

definitions.usage_notes: This word is almost entirely restricted to compounds. Contrary to earlier Egyptian, the ordinary word for house in Demotic is Íú•.wy.

etymologies.etymology_text:
==Demotic== ===Etymology===
From {{inh|egx-dem|egy|pr-Íú•Íú£|pr:aA|tr={{l|egy|pr-Íú•Íú£}}|pharaoh}}.
===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|egx-dem|/p…ô…æÀà ïo î/|/p…ô…æÀà ïa î/}} {{q|depending on dialect}}

===Etymology 1===
{{unk|egx-dem}}. The once-popular derivation from {{cog|egy|bw|b-w|tr={{m|egy|bw}}|place, thing, -ness}} is untenable given the form of the Fayyumic descendant.{{R:cop:ƒåern√Ω|77}} A corresponding hieroglyphic Egyptian word {{m|egy|mÍú£Íú•|U2:a-N21-Z1:pr|tr={{m|egy|mÍú£Íú•}}|place}} is attested from the end of the Third Intermediate Period onward, especially in late temple inscriptions, with the earliest certain attestation being in Papyrus Brooklyn 47.218.84,Meeks, Dimitri (1994) ‚Äú√âtymologies coptes. Notes et remarques‚Äù in ''Coptology: Past, Present and Future: Studies in Honour of Professor Rodolphe Kasser'', Louvain: Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 61, page 203‚Äì204. Meeks dates the papyrus to the Third Intermediate Period in this article, but [https://www.trismegistos.org/hhp/detail.php?tm=111740 Trismegistos] and the [http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/servlet/GetTextDetails?f=0&l=0&db=0&tc=19952 ''Thesaurus Linguae Aegyptiae''] place it in the reign of {{w|Psamtik I}}, citing his 2006 ‚ÄúMythes et legendes du Delta d‚Äôapr√®s le papyrus 47.218.8‚Äù in ''M√©moires publi√©s par les membres de l‚ÄôInstitut fran√ßais d‚Äôarch√©ologie orientale du Caire'' 125, pages 458‚Äì491. but this is contemporaneous with the spread of early Demotic. Meeks proposes that another term {{m|egy|bpÍú£t}} attested at the beginning of the Ramesside Period might be an early writing of the same word, but the absence of the final ayin is problematic.
====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|egx-dem|/ma ï/}}

===Etymology 2===
From {{inh|egx-dem|egy|mÍú£Íú•|mA-mAa:a:Y1|tr={{m|egy|mÍú£Íú•}}|to direct, to be true or just}}.
====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|egx-dem|/ÀàmuÀê î…ô ï/}}

definitions: [intransitive] to go, to walk, to travel

pronunciations: 1=egx-dem|2=/ÀànaŒ≤i/|ref={{cite-journal|author=Elmar Edel|title=Neues Material zur Herkunft der auslautenden Vokale -‚≤â und -‚≤ì im Koptischen|journal=Zeitschrift f√ºr √Ñgyptische Sprache und Altertumskunde|year=1961|volume=86|issue=1|doi=10.1524/zaes.1961.86.1.107}}

etymologies.etymology_text:
==Demotic== ===Etymology===
From {{inh|egx-dem|egy|nb|nbw-G37|tr={{l|egy|nb}}|damage, sin}}.
===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|egx-dem|/ÀànaŒ≤i/|ref={{cite-journal|author=Elmar Edel|title=Neues Material zur Herkunft der auslautenden Vokale -‚≤â und -‚≤ì im Koptischen|journal=Zeitschrift f√ºr √Ñgyptische Sprache und Altertumskunde|year=1961|volume=86|issue=1|doi=10.1524/zaes.1961.86.1.107}}}}

definitions: [intransitive] to fall, to descend, to perish

etymologies.etymology_text:
==Demotic== ===Etymology===
From {{inh|egx-dem|egy|·∏•trj|H-t*:r-E1|tr={{l|egy|·∏•trj}}|team of animals}}, with written variant H-t*:r-E6 when applied to horses.

==Demotic==

===Etymology===
From {{inh|egx-dem|egy-lat|·∏èp·∏•||apple}} <hiero>D:p-H-W-M2</hiero> Borrowed from a {{bor|egx-dem|sem}} language. Compare {{cog|he|◊™÷∑÷º◊§÷º◊ï÷º◊ó÷∑|tr=tapp≈´a·∏•|t=apple}}, and {{cog|ar|ÿ™ŸèŸÅŸéŸëÿßÿ≠|t=apples}}.<ref>{{R:cop:ƒåern√Ω|314}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|egx-dem|/tÕ° É…ômÀàp ∞eƒß/}}
